title: Grey Play Button
body: My "Play" button will arbitrarily go grey and unable to be interacted with. It happens multiple times a day. Sometimes the button will light back up again and all I needed to do is wait, but it doesn't always come back real quick. It's especially frustrating when playing a lot of games with friends, but invites are put on hold because of this weird play thing. I don't want to waste time waiting to see if the "Play" button will come back on its own, so I just relog. Sometimes it's still grey when I relog and relog again. It's getting real irritating.

replies.body:
Add 2 others with a stable connection having the same problem.    Hard to start games when we are taking turns with it greyed out.

Edit:  Added new bonus of being stuck in lobby can't find or quit.

Knock on wood that I found the solution. I completely uninstalled and reinstalled League of Legends. One of the patches must have loaded weird. Since reinstalling, I haven't had my play button go grey for no reason, but I'm on the lookout for it just in case.

If the Play button is intermittently going grey then you could be facing an unstable connection that's basically causing you to lose your pulse with the client.  I suggest using the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this.  Let me know if you run into any issues.

The thing is I'm not, really. My husband and I run off the same internet, both hardwired in at up to 40 mb. He gets it occasionally too, but we never have trouble in a game, and our connection checks out fine.  We aren't losing anything. Our internet's been working fine during our games. It's happening to a friend of ours as well in a different part of the country. Started happening to us a couple patches ago.
